name: emi.apel
description: APEL (Accounting Processor for Event Logs) is a tool that gathers CPU accounting information by parsing batch system and blah accounting log files and inserts it into a local MySQL database. APEL then publishes the data into a centralised repository.
releaseNotes: Just update the packages (yum update), no (re)configuration needed
changeLog: vulnerability bug fix- more details will be available at Advisory-SVG-2013-5615
